body:
Hi Dan,

If you hover over the HB_Glass Material or HB_Opaque Material you can see a couple of useful links (Radiance):

[http://www.jaloxa.eu/resources/radiance/colour_picker/index.shtml](http://www.jaloxa.eu/resources/radiance/colour_picker/index.shtml)

[http://www.artifice.com/radiance/rad_materials.html](http://www.artifice.com/radiance/rad_materials.html)

Other components of the material section have other links.



_A.

-A.
